eu.amidst.core.distribution

Class ConditionalLinearGaussian

  • java.lang.Object
    • eu.amidst.core.distribution.Distribution
      • eu.amidst.core.distribution.ConditionalDistribution
        • eu.amidst.core.distribution.ConditionalLinearGaussian
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class ConditionalLinearGaussian
extends ConditionalDistribution
    This class extends the abstract class ConditionalDistribution. It defines the Conditional Linear Gaussian distribution, i.e., the conditional distribution of a normal variable given a set of normal parents.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

        public boolean equalDist(Distribution dist,
                         double threshold)
        Tests if a given distribution is equal to this Distribution. Two distributions are considered equal if the difference is lower than a given threshold.
        Specified by:

        Parameters:
